abstract.t: As all members of the PKIX Working Group know, draft-ietf-pkix-ipki-pkalgs-05.txt is with the RFC Editor. However, an error in the ASN.1modules was discovered. The authors are working with the RFC Editorto ensure that the corrected ASN.1 modules are included in the finaltext, and we are publishing this Internet-Draft to distribute thecorrected ASN.1 module as quickly as possible.This Internet-Draft contains only the updated ASN.1 module.
